snippet.textDisplay: I just love how each chapter of this game had its unique setting, story and characters. This one was memorable for many reasons, but I always liked spooky themed levels in video games. That and Viviane was my favorite partner in the game. I would love to have a Paper Mario collection for the Switch with the first 3 games in the series.
snippet.textOriginal: I just love how each chapter of this game had its unique setting, story and characters. This one was memorable for many reasons, but I always liked spooky themed levels in video games. That and Viviane was my favorite partner in the game. I would love to have a Paper Mario collection for the Switch with the first 3 games in the series.

snippet.textDisplay: @Hefaestos This one is the real standout of the series. The first is cute and fun and worth a play, though not as deep; the third one is rough because the mix of RPG and platforming that's very easy, plus lots of back-tracking stretch out the gameplay even though the story was good. If you get a chance to pick up TTYD or even Paper Mario 64 on virtual console, I recommend them.
snippet.textOriginal: @Hefaestos This one is the real standout of the series. The first is cute and fun and worth a play, though not as deep; the third one is rough because the mix of RPG and platforming that's very easy, plus lots of back-tracking stretch out the gameplay even though the story was good. If you get a chance to pick up TTYD or even Paper Mario 64 on virtual console, I recommend them.

snippet.textDisplay: I missed out on all Paper Marios, so I would definitely purchase a re-release. I also would like to keep the genders of the ghosts as in the Japanese version, as unlikely as that may sound.
snippet.textOriginal: I missed out on all Paper Marios, so I would definitely purchase a re-release. I also would like to keep the genders of the ghosts as in the Japanese version, as unlikely as that may sound.

snippet.textDisplay: Funny, I was playing this game today and finished chapter 4. This chapter is very terrible in terms of level design, but at least it had good storyline, music, and visuals.

snippet.textDisplay: This game is amazing. It's on my top 10 favorite of all time. The soundtrack is just insane.
snippet.textOriginal: This game is amazing. It's on my top 10 favorite of all time. The soundtrack is just insane.

snippet.textDisplay: Twilight Town was a really cool setting. This game was full of them. The backtracking in Chapter 4 got pretty annoying, but the story in it was great.
